issue.title: [Website] The title element of the top page is empty
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1426](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1426). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
site/_includes/top.html has 2 title elements. The 2nd one has the correct content, but the 1st one is converted to empty, so web browsers can't show title.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1426?focusedCommentId=16145197) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
Issue resolved by pull request 1006
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/1006>
